org.magicdgs.readtools.engine

Class RTReadWalker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.broadinstitute.hellbender.cmdline.CommandLineProgram
      • org.broadinstitute.hellbender.engine.GATKTool
        • org.broadinstitute.hellbender.engine.ReadWalker
          • org.magicdgs.readtools.engine.RTReadWalker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.broadinstitute.barclay.argparser.CommandLinePluginProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComputeProperStatByWindow

    public abstract class RTReadWalker
extends org.broadinstitute.hellbender.engine.ReadWalker
    Wrapper around ReadWalker for ReadTools.

    Includes the following specificities for ReadTools.

    • Logging is done with RTHelpConstants.
    • Uses CheckQualityReadTransformer to throw for wrongly encoded qualities.
